# content

**Instance Property**

The main content of the note.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var content: INNoteContent? { get }
```

## Getting the Note Content

- **title**: The title text for the note.
- **groupName**: The group that contains the note.

items.description: The title text for the note.
items.name: title

items.description: The group that contains the note.
items.name: groupName

title: content
